column5: This cabin has two bedrooms and two baths and sleeps 4. This cabin also has a large kitchen with granite countertops and a large island. Just bring your own food. It also has a fenced backyard and a full-size washer and dryer. Feel free to explore the creeks, woods, pastures and hilltops. The ranch is a great place to see Texas wildlife. If you go through a gate, please leave it as you found it. Stepping stones lead from your front porch to the creekside patio.
